body: Wonder what pink's deal is, seems hysterical, haven't followed on that rushed shitshow of a "game" (more like an unfinished tech demo) that is pkmn shit & shill, so I got absolutely no context on her personality other then her being smug. My guess is that she's on there in "cut n pay DLC island" being the de-facto queen bitch until main character sue beats that fraud of a "champion" with the shoehorned special zard (probably in one-shot since she's using the water starter which has high SpA + STAB and the game is piss easy to become OP and roll the "game" like a Katamari ball of trubbish that it is), forks over the 30 IRL buckerino's and then scots over there to own that place as well and she's isn't having it, she probably figured that she can't beat the OP player character who beat the gigazard (ironic that they acknowledge her status as the region's champ here in this hentai, but not in the "game", probably because it got cut during development) so she doubles down on being a slut.
